prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Promptbook is divided into several packages published from a monorepo. Key packages include @promptbook/wizzard for running books in Node, @promptbook/core for main logic, and integrations with various AI APIs like OpenAI, Anthropic Claude, and DeepSeek.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Promptbook, packages, monorepo, @promptbook/wizzard, Node, @promptbook/core, integrations, AI APIs, OpenAI, Anthropic Claude, DeepSeek
